text: Rebisi is a traditional kingdom of the Ikwerre people in what is today Nigeria. It is located within Port Harcourt (local government area) and comprises the localities of Oroabali, Orolozu, Orogbum, Oroworukwo, Orochiri, Oromeruezimgbu and Oroada. The traditional ruler who is also the paramount king of Port Harcourt is the occupant of the Eze Apara Rebisi stool and serves as the intermediary between the Rebisi people of Port Harcourt and the government. ==History of Rebisi== ==List of rulers of Rebisi== * HRM Eze Elikwu Ekaninwo, Eze Apara Rebisi IV * HRM Eze Elikwu Ekaninwo Mati, Eze Apara Rebisi V * HRM Eze Elikwu Woruji, Eze Apara Rebisi VI * HRM Eze Elikwu Dike, Eze Apara Rebisi VII * HRM Eze Elikwu Worluchem, Eze Apara Rebisi VIII * HRM Eze Phillip Elikwu, Eze Apara Rebisi IX * HRM Eze Victor Weli Woluchem, Eze Apara Rebisi X * HRM Eze Sunday Nnanta Woluchem, Eze Apara Rebisi XI * HRM Eze Victor Nnanna Woluchem II, Eze Apara Rebisi XII ==References== Category:Port Harcourt (local government area) Category:Ikwerre people Category:Monarchies of Africa
title: Rebisi
